title: Flipped Learning-Based Elementary Interdisciplinary Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Core elementary curriculum theories and foundational language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Intensive short-term course applying flipped learning models to enable pre-service teachers to design language instruction using interdisciplinary education principles

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 5-minute video lecture explaining core principles of intercultural education (considering multicultural backgrounds of learners)
Learners can submit one language lesson design plan applicable to multicultural classrooms based on materials provided in a flipped learning environment
Learners can provide three or more specific improvement suggestions for peer-designed lesson plans through peer evaluation

resources: OER materials related to interdisciplinary education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
